map.string: {"version":6,"data":[{"id":2,"name":"520颜值-在线时长","remark":"主播达到4小时直播即广播","linktype":0,"link":"","mPic":"https://cs-op.douyucdn.cn/dygev/2018/05/08/3efb01a8f232fe75f69c52b5c99b0726.png","mPicScale":3,"mOriginalWidth":236,"mOriginalHeight":120,"mFrameX":148,"mFrameY":38,"mFrameWidth":15,"mFrameHeight":60,"mLeftPadding":150,"mRightPadding":70,"mCenterY":68,"mChannel":3,"mContent":{"linktype":0,"child":[{"value":"恭喜主播","color":"ffffff","linktype":0,"type":0},{"value":"onn","color":"ffff00","linktype":0,"type":1},{"value":"开启2倍心动值加成，据说勤奋的主播会更让人心动呦~","color":"ffffff","linktype":0,"type":0}]}},{"id":1,"name":"520颜值-玫瑰花雨","remark":"赠送礼物的充能广播","linktype":1,"link":"","mPic":"https://cs-op.douyucdn.cn/dygev/2018/05/08/bb86c5b12f6078eb06cb3ec5d19e0771.png","mPicScale":3,"mOriginalWidth":236,"mOriginalHeight":120,"mFrameX":145,"mFrameY":38,"mFrameWidth":16,"mFrameHeight":60,"mLeftPadding":150,"mRightPadding":70,"mCenterY":68,"mChannel":3,"mContent":{"linktype":0,"child":[{"value":"恭喜主播","color":"ffffff","linktype":0,"type":0},{"value":"onn","color":"ffff00","linktype":0,"type":1},{"value":"获得甜蜜告白，直播间散落玫瑰花雨，快来围观吧~","color":"ffffff","linktype":0,"type":0}]}}]}
